{{Infobox company | company_name = Ubisoft Milan | company_logo = | caption = | company_type = [[Subsidiary]] of [[Ubisoft]] | foundation = [[2001]] (as '''Ubisoft Italy''') | location = Via Enrico Fermi 10/2
20090 - Buccinasco, (Milano) Italy | key_people = Stefano Celentano (Communication Manager) | industry = [[Interactive entertainment]] | products = [[Video game]]s | operating_income = | net_income = | owner = | num_employees = | parent = [[Ubisoft]] | homepage = http://www.ubisoft.co.it/ }} '''Ubisoft Milan''' is an [[Italy|Italian]] videogame development studio in [[Milan]], [[Italy]] operated by publisher Ubisoft. Formerly known as '''Ubisoft Italy'''. It was later changed to: Ubisoft Milan. {{Ubisoft-stub}} {{Ubisoft}} [[ru:Ubisoft Milan]] [[Category:Software companies of Italy]] [[Category:Ubisoft]]
